group_1.textRight: Do you think we can summon him without @the dancers?

group_1.textLeft: He's a god, after all. We're not the head priestess, @so we might not be able to.

group_1.textCenter: We won't know unless we try!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textCenter: Then, let's try shouting really loud!

group_1.textLeft: Okay.
Guess not, huh?

group_1.textCenter: Hello. You're the ones who called out to me, right?

group_1.textLeft: Then what was the point of the dance...?

group_1.textRight: Perhaps it was a show they put on to make things @feel solemn...
Did you call me without any reason?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, no! We have things we wish to ask you!

group_1.textRight: I'll answer anything you like, assuming I'm able to.
So, what would you like to ask me, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: Um, we found out about how we become Devils...
We were wondering if you knew any method of avoiding that?
A method by which we can continue being Diviners.
We're the ones who fight for the Land of the Rising Sun― we don't want to make anybody suffer!

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry to tell you this, but I can't meet that expectation.

group_1.textLeft: You don't know any...?

group_1.textRight: I don't.
At the very least, I don't know any method of @avoiding it.
I haven't seen many successful cases thus far, either.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
You just said "many", didn't you?!
That just means that Lord Kyūbē might not know,
but some method does exist, right?!
But Lord Kyūbē can't tell us anything about it, @yes...?

group_1.textRight: True. It would be difficult for me to tell you by myself.
But it's possible for you to see how it works, @and obtain it for yourselves.

group_1.textLeft: Obtain...?

group_1.textRight: Would you happen to know a place called Kamihama City?

group_1.textLeft: I don't...
Nor I...
Ah, I've heard about it before!

group_1.textRight: Kamihama City is home to an automatic purification system.
Therefore, if you manage to obtain that system,
I think you will be able to avoid becoming Devils.
Of course, I can't say any of this with certainty.

group_1.textLeft: It's fine! That should be enough...! I can feel a huge surge of hope all at once...!
Guys, let's go! To Kamihama City!

group_1.textRight: Yes. Allow me to take care of the map and @guide duties!
I can explain stuff about modern society to Shizuka!

group_1.textLeft: T—that won't be necessary.

group_1.textRight: Have you ever used an IC card...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Haven't even heard the name.

group_1.textRight: It's decided!
If you plan on going to Kamihama, @allow me to explain several things first.

group_1.textLeft: Explain...?

group_1.textRight: First, there are dozens of girls like you in @Kamihama City.
I suggest keeping that in mind.
Second, they have some different terminology.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: For example, Tokime territory is the only place...
where girls like you are known as Diviners.

group_1.textLeft: What do they call us, then?

group_1.textRight: You're known as Magical Girls.
